alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 2:35AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow (including sleet) accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Missouri, Franklin MO and Saint Charles MO Counties. In Illinois, Jersey IL County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
